channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo

item.title: Tornadoes Reported in South and Midwest Amid Powerful Storm System

item.title: Plaid notches $575 million funding round as fintech sector rides upswing
item.description: The share sale, which will provide liquidity to employees, includes participation from Franklin Templeton, Fidelity, BlackRock, Ribbit, and NEA.

item.title: A Stunned World Reckons With Economic Fallout From Trump’s Tariffs

item.title: Europe’s secret ‘big bazooka’ could be a key retaliatory tool against Trump’s new tariffs
item.description: The Anti-Coercion Instrument is a secret weapon the EU has never used before.

item.title: Stock Markets Slide After Trump Unveils Tariffs
item.description: The initial market reaction suggested that the scale of the tariffs had come as a surprise to investors around the world.

item.title: Trump’s tariffs likely to shift—but not before more pain, UBS says
item.description: UBS said that in the coming quarters, tariffs are expected to be notched down for some nations and inched higher for others.

item.title: Siemens to boost drug discoveries using AI through the $5.1 billion acquisition of U.S. software firm Dotmatics

item.title: The Global Backlash to Trump’s Tariffs, and Deep Cuts to Public Health
item.description: Plus, a rare Beatles audition tape.

item.title: The digital nomads and wealthy retirees moving to super-luxe residential megayachts for a neverending cruise
item.description: The World and a slew of other residential megayachts travel the high seas in high style, year-round.

item.title: Live Updates: China and Europe Vow to Respond to Trump’s Tariffs
item.description: Investors’ shock at the size of the levies sent markets in Asia sharply lower. Experts warned that the global economy could be upended.

item.title: Netanyahu Arrives in Hungary, Finding a Rare Welcome in Europe
item.description: The visit comes as the Israeli prime minister faces an arrest warrant against him by the International Criminal Court.
